query_1.text: Who was Napoleon Bonaparte and what were his major contributions to European history?

query_2.text: What significant events marked Napoleon Bonaparte's rise to power in France?

query_3.text: When did Napoleon Bonaparte become Emperor of the French, and what were the implications of this title?

query_4.text: Where did Napoleon Bonaparte conduct his most famous military campaigns, and how did they impact Europe?

query_5.text: Why did Napoleon Bonaparte's reign come to an end, and what were the consequences of his downfall?

query_6.text: How did Napoleon Bonaparte's legal reforms, particularly the Napoleonic Code, influence modern legal systems?
